title: Vertex operator algebra bundles on modular curves and their associated modular forms
summary: This paper describes the vector bundle on the elliptic modular curve that is associated to a vertex operator algebra $V$ (VOA) or more generally a quasi-vertex operator algebra (QVOA), with a view towards future applications aimed at studying the characters of VOAs. We explain how the modes of sections of $V$ give rise naturally to $V$-valued quasi-modular forms. The space $Q(V)$ of $V$-valued quasi-modular forms is endowed with the structure of a doubled QVOA, and in particular the algebra $Q$ of quasi-modular forms is itself a doubled QVOA. $Q(V)$ also admits a natural derivative operator arising from the connection on the bundle defined by $V$ and the modular derivative, which we call the raising operator. We introduce an associated lowering operator $Λ$ on $Q(V)$ having the property that the $V$-valued modular forms $M(V)\subseteq Q(V)$ are the kernel of $Λ$. This extends the classical theory of scalar-valued quasi-modular forms. We exhibit an explicit isomorphism of $M(V)$ with $M \otimes V$. Finally, the coordinate invariance of vertex operators implies that $M(V)$ has a natural Hecke theory, and we use this isomorphism to fully describe the Hecke eigensystems: they are the same as the systems of eigenvalues that arise from scalar-valued quasi-modular forms.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了椭圆模曲线上与顶点算子代数(VOA)相关的向量丛，构建了V-值拟模形式理论，并建立了其与标量拟模形式的联系，为研究VOA的特征标提供了新框架。
AI.motivation: 研究顶点算子代数在椭圆模曲线上的向量丛表示，旨在为研究VOA的特征标提供新的数学工具和理论框架，扩展经典的标量拟模形式理论到VOA值的情形。
AI.method: 通过VOA的截面模式自然构造V-值拟模形式空间Q(V)，赋予其双倍QVOA结构，引入提升算子和下降算子Λ，其中Λ的核对应V-值模形式M(V)，并建立M(V)与M⊗V的显式同构。
AI.result: 成功构建了V-值拟模形式的系统理论，证明了M(V)与M⊗V的同构关系，揭示了V-值模形式具有自然的Hecke理论，且其特征值系统与标量拟模形式的特征值系统相同。
AI.conclusion: 该工作将经典的拟模形式理论推广到VOA值情形，为研究VOA特征标提供了新的数学框架，建立了V-值模形式与标量模形式之间的深刻联系，为未来应用奠定了基础。

title: Symmetries of Borcherds algebras
summary: We give an overview of the construction of Borcherds algebras, particularly the Monstrous Lie algebras $\mathfrak m_g$ constructed by Carnahan, where $g$ is an element of the Monster finite simple group. When $g$ is the identity element, $\mathfrak m_g$ is the Monster Lie algebra of Borcherds. We discuss the appearance of the $\mathfrak m_g$ in compactified models of the Heterotic String. We also summarize recent work on associating Lie group analogs to the Lie algebras $\mathfrak m_g$. We include a discussion of some open problems.

AI.tldr: 该论文综述了Borcherds代数的构造，特别是Carnahan构建的Monstrous李代数𝔪_g，其中g是Monster有限单群的元素。当g是单位元时，𝔪_g就是Borcherds的Monster李代数。论文讨论了𝔪_g在异质弦紧致化模型中的出现，总结了将李群类比与𝔪_g相关联的最新工作，并包含了一些开放问题的讨论。
AI.motivation: 研究Borcherds代数的构造，特别是Monstrous李代数𝔪_g，探索这些代数在弦理论中的应用，并建立与这些李代数相关的李群理论。
AI.method: 通过综述性方法，总结Carnahan构建Monstrous李代数𝔪_g的构造过程，分析这些代数在异质弦紧致化模型中的出现，并概述将李群类比与这些李代数相关联的最新研究成果。
AI.result: 论文提供了Borcherds代数构造的全面概述，阐明了Monstrous李代数𝔪_g的数学结构及其在弦理论中的物理意义，总结了将李群理论扩展到这些无限维李代数的进展。
AI.conclusion: Monstrous李代数𝔪_g是Borcherds代数理论的重要扩展，在弦理论中具有物理意义，将李群理论扩展到这些代数是一个有前景的研究方向，但仍存在许多开放问题需要进一步探索。

title: Twisted Cherednik spectrum as a $q,t$-deformation
summary: The common eigenfunctions of the twisted Cherednik operators can be first analyzed in the limit of $q\longrightarrow 1$. Then, the polynomial eigenfunctions form a simple set originating from the symmetric ground state of non-vanishing degree and excitations over it, described by non-symmetric polynomials of higher degrees and enumerated by weak compositions. This pattern is inherited by the full spectrum at $q\neq 1$, which can be considered as a deformation. The whole story looks like a typical NP problem: the Cherednik equations are difficult to solve, but easy to check the solution once it is somehow found.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了扭曲Cherednik算子的本征函数，首先在q→1极限下分析，然后推广到q≠1的完整谱，发现其具有类似NP问题的特性。
AI.motivation: 研究扭曲Cherednik算子的本征函数结构，理解其在q→1极限下的行为以及如何推广到一般情况，探索这类算子方程求解的数学特性。
AI.method: 首先分析q→1极限下的扭曲Cherednik算子本征函数，研究多项式本征函数的构成：从非零度的对称基态出发，通过弱组合枚举的高次非对称多项式描述激发态。然后将这种模式继承到q≠1的完整谱中，将其视为一种变形。
AI.result: 发现扭曲Cherednik算子的本征函数具有特定的结构模式：在q→1极限下，多项式本征函数形成从对称基态出发的简单集合，激发态由高次非对称多项式描述。这种模式可以继承到q≠1的完整谱中，整个问题呈现出典型的NP问题特性：Cherednik方程难以求解，但一旦找到解则容易验证。
AI.conclusion: 扭曲Cherednik算子的本征函数结构具有系统性模式，从q→1极限到一般情况的变形保持了特定的数学结构，这类算子方程的求解具有NP问题的典型特征，为相关数学物理问题的研究提供了新的视角。

title: Symmetric spaces, non-formal star products and Drinfel'd twists
comment: arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1712.06367
summary: These notes refer to a minicourse I gave at the occasion of the conference meeting ``Applications of Noncommutative Geometry to Gauge Theories, Field Theories, and Quantum Space-Time'' to be held from 7 April to 11 April 2025 at the Centre International de Rencontres Mathématiques in Luminy. They consist in a review of a long standing work of mine and collaborators (see references therein) in the field of non-formal deformation quantization admitting a large group of symmetries. But they also contain new material and results. More precisely, in a first part, I present a method (called the Retract Method) to define quantizations/symbolic calculi and associated operator symbol composition formulae (non-formal deformations/star products) of symplectic symmetric spaces such as the hyperbolic plane (Kahler) or symmetric co-adjoint orbits of the Poincaré group (non-metric). In a second part, I explain how to derive non-formal Drinfel'd twists for actions of non-Abelian solvable Lie groups (non-Abelian Universal Deformation Formulae) on or Fr échet algebras from the non-formal noncommutative symmetric spaces defined in the first part.

AI.tldr: 本文回顾了作者在非形式形变量子化领域的工作，介绍了针对辛对称空间的Retract Method量化方法，并推导了非阿贝尔可解李群的非形式Drinfel'd扭曲。
AI.motivation: 研究具有大对称群的非形式形变量子化方法，为辛对称空间（如双曲平面、庞加莱群对称余伴随轨道）建立量化/符号计算体系，并推导非阿贝尔可解李群的非形式Drinfel'd扭曲。
AI.method: 采用Retract Method定义辛对称空间的量化/符号计算及其相关的算子符号组合公式（非形式形变/星积）。然后从第一部分定义的非交换对称空间推导非阿贝尔可解李群的非形式Drinfel'd扭曲（非阿贝尔通用形变公式）。
AI.result: 提出了针对辛对称空间的非形式形变量子化方法，建立了相应的符号计算体系，并成功推导出非阿贝尔可解李群的非形式Drinfel'd扭曲，为Fréchet代数上的群作用提供了新的形变公式。
AI.conclusion: 本文系统总结了作者在非形式形变量子化领域的研究成果，提出了Retract Method这一新方法，并展示了如何从对称空间的量化推导出非阿贝尔李群的Drinfel'd扭曲，为非交换几何在规范理论、场论和量子时空中的应用提供了新的数学工具。

title: Rational RG flow, extension, and Witt class
comment: 31 pages; v2: typos fixed, minor modification of the proof, statement of the theorem unchanged; v3: added conjectures on signs of the relevant coupling
summary:
Consider a renormalization group flow preserving a pre-modular fusion category $\mathcal S_1$. If it flows to a rational conformal field theory, the surviving symmetry $\mathcal S_1$ flows to a pre-modular fusion category $\mathcal S_2$ with monoidal functor $F:\mathcal S_1\to\mathcal S_2$. By clarifying mathematical (especially category theoretical) meaning of renormalization group domain wall/interface or boundary condition, we find the hidden extended vertex operator (super)algebra gives a unique (up to braided equivalence) completely $(\mathcal S_1\boxtimes\mathcal S_2)'$-anisotropic representative of the Witt equivalence class $[\mathcal S_1\boxtimes\mathcal S_2]$. The mathematical conjecture is supported physically, and passes various tests in concrete examples including non/unitary minimal models, and Wess-Zumino-Witten models. In particular, the conjecture holds beyond diagonal cosets.
  The picture also establishes the conjectured half-integer condition, which fixes infrared conformal dimensions mod $\frac12$. It further leads to the double braiding relation, namely braiding structures jump at conformal fixed points. As an application, we solve the flow from the $E$-type minimal model $(A_{10},E_6)\to M(4,3)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究重整化群流如何影响预模融合范畴，发现隐藏的扩展顶点算子代数提供了Witt等价类的唯一代表，并建立了半整数条件和双辫关系。
AI.motivation: 研究重整化群流如何影响预模融合范畴的对称性结构，理解在共形固定点处对称性范畴如何变化，以及这些变化背后的数学物理机制。
AI.method: 通过澄清重整化群畴壁/界面或边界条件的数学意义（特别是范畴论意义），分析隐藏的扩展顶点算子（超）代数，研究其如何提供Witt等价类的唯一代表。
AI.result: 发现隐藏的扩展顶点算子代数给出了Witt等价类[𝒮₁⊠𝒮₂]的唯一（直到辫等价）完全(𝒮₁⊠𝒮₂)'-各向异性代表，建立了半整数条件，推导出双辫关系，并成功应用于具体模型。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了重整化群流中预模融合范畴变化的数学框架，证明了相关猜想，揭示了对称性结构在共形固定点的跳跃现象，为理解量子场论中的对称性演化提供了新视角。
